originalText.text: In 2018, I was diagnosed with breast cancer.  I cannot begin to tell you the denial and stress as I looked at Dr. Balis and told her she had the wrong file. Dr. Balija was my doctor from 2018 forward in New Jersey and I am now traveling to New York to be her patient again she is second to none in her field. Plus, she has fantastic bedside mannerism is attentive, and for me to travel to New York that speaks volumes -I’m hoping to see her in the next few weeks.

originalText.text: Dr. Balija is a fantastic physician.  Breast health concerns can be very stressful and Dr. Balija's bedside manner helped to put my mind at ease. She listens well, answers all your questions and concerns and is very empathetic. Highly recommend.
